hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Farore's Wind# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
